item.title: BlackRock’s Fink Hails Macron’s ‘Bold Decisions’ at NYC Gala
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The CEO of BlackRock Inc., Larry Fink, has only good words for Emmanuel Macron. “He is the one who is pushing the country forward,” being “unusually clear-eyed about the future,” with his “appetite for risks” and “making bold decisions,” the head of the world’s largest asset manager s...
